title: Initiate tailwind for the project
description: THis project is a webpage for a Desktop tool to provide info about the app, remember this throughout the project, you shall not add any test cases
plan:
1. Install Tailwind CSS and dependencies: npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer
2. Initialize Tailwind config: npx tailwindcss init -p
3. Configure tailwind.config.js with content paths: ['./index.html', './src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}']
4. Add Tailwind directives to src/index.css: @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities;
5. Verify setup by adding test Tailwind classes to App.jsx

title: theme set for tailwind
description:
Add this as theme in index css
  #000000; /* Pure black background */
  #16181c; /* Slightly lighter for cards/inputs */

  /* Borders - Subtle and thin */
  #2f3336; /* Standard Twitter border */
  #202327; /* Muted separators */

  /* Text - High contrast */
  #e7e9ea; /* Main white text */
  #71767b; /* Secondary/Username grey */
  #536471; /* Tertiary/Timestamp grey */

  /* Accents - Twitter Blue */
  #1d9bf0; /* The main "Post" blue */
  #1a8cd8; /* Slightly darker blue on hover */
  #8ecdf8; /* Light blue for active icons/glows */

  /* Status Colors */
  #1d9bf0; /* Links and verification badges */
  #1d9bf033; /* Transparent blue for ring focus */
  #ffd400; /* Gold (Verified/Premium) */
  #f4212e; /* Heart/Like red */
plan:
1. Add CSS custom properties in src/index.css :root section
2. Define background colors: --bg-black (#000000), --bg-card (#16181c)
3. Define border colors: --border (#2f3336), --border-muted (#202327)
4. Define text colors: --text-primary (#e7e9ea), --text-secondary (#71767b), --text-tertiary (#536471)
5. Define accent colors: --accent-blue (#1d9bf0), --accent-blue-hover (#1a8cd8), --accent-blue-light (#8ecdf8)
6. Define status colors: --gold (#ffd400), --red (#f4212e), --blue-transparent (#1d9bf033)
7. Extend Tailwind theme in tailwind.config.js to use these CSS variables
8. Set body background to black and text to primary white
